tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE team_availability (
    team_id INT,
    team_member VARCHAR(50),
    date DATE,
    available_time_start TIME,
    available_time_end TIME
)

CREATE TABLE TeamMembers ( 
	id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
	name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
	email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE, 
	location VARCHAR(50), 
	schedule JSON 
);

CREATE TABLE TeamSchedule ( 
	id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
	member_id INT, 
	event_name VARCHAR(100), 
	start_time TIMESTAMP, 
	end_time TIMESTAMP, 
	FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES TeamMembers(id) 
);

CREATE TABLE team_members (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    position VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE team_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_id INT,
    date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES team_members(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE team_availability (
    availability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    member_id INT,
    date DATE,
    available BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (member_id) REFERENCES team_members(member_id)
);

CREATE TABLE team_schedule (
    event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    event_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    event_date DATE NOT NULL,
    start_time TIME NOT NULL,
    end_time TIME NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE team_communication (
    message_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT NOT NULL,
    receiver_id INT NOT NULL,
    message_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    sent_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE team_availability (
  availability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  member_id INT REFERENCES team_members(member_id),
  available_date DATE NOT NULL,
  available_start_time TIME NOT NULL,
  available_end_time TIME NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE team_leave (
  leave_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  member_id INT REFERENCES team_members(member_id),
  leave_reason TEXT,
  leave_start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  leave_end_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE team_communication (
  message_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_id INT REFERENCES team_members(member_id),
  receiver_id INT REFERENCES team_members(member_id),
  message_content TEXT,
  message_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
